mama ghanakam andura aarambha kare hudek aathma thrupthiya udesaya.mama mage ghanakam andura ta aadaraya kalemi.namudu ghanakam andura liyannata jiwath nowemi.jiwath wida mata liyannata yamak labenu atha.kese namuth blog lokaye sundara minisun boho denek handuna ganimata labima gana thutu wemi.mita wada atuwa tika pawasannata nohakiya.min pasu mehi kisima satahanak nothabenu atha.sadahatama samu ganimi.sahrudayange satahan satahan kiyawami.eewa gana mage adahasda prakasha karami.namudu adin pasu ghanakam andure kisiwak pala nowanu atha.."manawaka" yana namaya athithaye mathaka samaga muhuwanu atha.
